ComicInfo.Summary:
Odin confronts the Sandman while a mysterious woman from the Sandman's past abducts Lyta Hall. Meanwhile, Lyta herself encounters the Furies and sets into motion a grave chain of events. "The Kindly Ones" part 7.
Odin One-Eye appears to confront the Sandman as a mysterious woman linked to Morpheus' past abducts Lyta Hall. Meanwhile, Lyta's encounter with the Furies will gravely impact future happenings.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-08-06 16:33:55. [CVDB39613]
